overview: A third-rate photographer who snaps and sells nude pictures, can't get over the woman who left him after amazing sex. One day, he works with a model named Su-jin to meet the deadline. She is daring. She claims to comfort the wouded man and starts to seduce him. He falls for her. But one day, his ex-lover comes back and Su-jin witnesses their intercourse. She falls asleep in the bathroom and the photographer realizes her loves her...
title: Nude Model
